name: Golden Boy
reason: has the most potential

name: shortest stick
reason: has the lowest probability of winning at the beginning

name: nerd or loner
reason: awarded for finding something in the rules before the first game, if no one finds it jack wins

name: Best Friends
reason: Awarded to the people with the most similar brackets

name: Dom/Sub
reason: Awarded to the person whose winning (most) most implies someone elses losing (sub)

name: Fell from grace
reason: worst ratio of 1st round picks/ 2nd round picks

name: Fortified
reason: Person whose probability of winning changed the least from the first round to now

name: bribery
reason: Typical had my teams going the furthest (qr code to my venmo)

name: More than fair
reason: All named brackets (use snow white image)

name: balanced
reason: Person who's number of picks was closest to 50%

name: Unicorn
reason: Submitted something to happen that never has

name: Lone wolf/sheep
reason: Has the bracket most (dis)similar to everyone else

name: Another Life
reason: By another metric you won, picking the most games (logo is mario 1 up)

name: Pants Coin
reason: luckily have the least point differential for correctly picked games

name: Joever/hard hat
reason: awarded to the first person eliminated (picture of joe biden, and the maga hat)

name: Flash/Flash
reason: First and last to 750 points (the flash and flash from zootopia pictures)

name: well duh
reason: Correctly predicted the most not close games (win by more than 10)

name: Scatt er gories
reason: was the only person to pick your champion to win (scategories logo picture)

name: Believer
reason: correctly picked THE lowest seed to advance to a round (can be won multiple times) (shrek picture)

name: Dustin
reason: awarded for least underdog points received compared to potential (picture of dustin)

name: Husky
reason: best performance of east - south

name: Down/Left/Up/Right
reason: best performance in each division (each piece of a playstation D pad)

name: heartbreaker/heartbroken
reason: correctly/ incorrectly had a game where they were the only one to pick a team (before final 4) (hammer and broken heart logo)
